text: I wanted to let all  workflow developers know that you are welcome to install our new VLOOKUP app. As long as its in a developer/demo portal, *we are happy to turn it on for you for free* and we'd love to hear your feedback about it. If its installed into a customer portal, you get a free 14-day trial and we will be happy to provide members of this Slack group a discount code to use and get 25% off a subscription.
